title: Chronicles of Asadore: The Quest to the Emberlands
description: Chronicles of Asadore : Quest to the Emberlands- is a 2023 CLC First Place Excellence Award Winner and a Readers Review 5 Star Book  Embark on an epic odyssey into the world of Asadore, where the fate of an entire world hangs in the balance. Ellie cherished the simple joys of existence alongside her four closest friends. But life's tranquil facade shatters in mere moments, as she grapples with the unforgiving hand of destiny. In the blink of an eye, Ellie’s life casts her into a role of The Keeper of the Water Element. Fueled by her life-long love of fantasy quests, Ellie sets forth with unwavering determination, only to discover that the challenges she faces are far more dangerous than can be found in any movie.Bound by the legacy of her grandmother, Ellie and her friends face a journey of the utmost importance, safeguarding Asadore’s delicate balance from the clutches of the formidable House of Blaize, masters of the Fire Element. Led by Esmerelda Blaize, who seeks to thrust Asadore into chaos and seize control of Asadore.Along the way, Ellie and her companions are pursued by agents of the Blaize family, determined to prevent them from completing their quest. Ellie learns that true strength lies in unity, relying on her friends and forging alliances with the other Elemental families of Air and Earth.Their mission is clear, their determination unwavering – to vanquish the forces of evil and safeguard the very essence of Asadore. Join Ellie and her valiant companions in "Quest to the Emberlands," a gripping tale of courage, friendship, and the relentless pursuit of heroism in the face of insurmountable odds. The world of Asadore awaits its champions; will they rise to the occasion or succumb to the shadows? The epic adventure begins here.
author: Robin M.  Farella
